sentences.en: And , as always , in unashamed offering there is a secret fragrance.
sentences.cn: 而且, 自然呈现的浓郁风情里,一如既往地有暗香浮动.

sentences.en: He looked at her with unashamed curiosity.
sentences.cn: 他带着肆无忌惮的好奇瞧着她.
他对金钱恬不知耻的贪恋

sentences.en: I grinned at him in unashamed delight.
sentences.cn: 我高兴地朝他笑了笑，一点也不觉得难为情。

sentences.en: There stood Sir Henry doing nothing less than a tribal war dance 9 of unashamed ecstasy.
sentences.cn: 亨利先生站在那里,只是忘形地跳着一种部落出战时候的舞蹈.

sentences.en: There stood Sir Henry doing nothing less than a tribal war dance of sheer unashamed ecstasy.
sentences.cn: 里面是亨利爵士,他欢蹦乱跳像在跳部落出征的舞蹈,表现出毫无顾忌的真正的快乐.

sentences.en: They are sensual with an unashamed violence that leaves you breathless.
sentences.cn: 它们是肉感的,简直大胆到不顾廉耻的地方,叫你看了目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: They kissed each other with unashamed delight.
sentences.cn: 他们愉快地相吻,并不觉得难为情.

sentences.en: We advocate commercial reputation and morality as to fulfill the desire for unashamed pleasure.
sentences.cn: 本店崇尚商誉商德,以期得到问心无愧的满足.

words.tran_cn: 无耻的；恬不知耻的；问心无愧的

trans.tran_cn: 不害羞的，不难为情的，无羞耻心的
trans.tran_en: not feeling embarrassed or ashamed about something that people might disapprove of
